abstract: Multichannel News: “Discovery Communications will launch Planet Green, its 24-hour eco-lifestyle network, June 4 at 6 p.m., officials said Tuesday.”
lead_paragraph: Multichannel News: “Discovery Communications will launch Planet Green, its 24-hour eco-lifestyle network, June 4 at 6 p.m., officials said Tuesday.”

headline.main: Planet Green Confirms Its Premiere Date
